See [CHANGELOG.md](https://github.com/Ic0u/Rokio/blob/main/CHANGELOG.md) for details.

## <img src="https://cdn.simpleicons.org/github/fff" width="18"> Downloads

### <img src="https://cdn.simpleicons.org/apple/999" width="16"> macOS

| Platform | Architecture | Format |
|----------|-------------|--------|
| macOS | Universal (recommended) | `.dmg` |
| macOS | Apple Silicon (M1/M2/M3/M4) | `_aarch64.dmg` |
| macOS | Intel (x86_64) | `_x64.dmg` |

### <img src="https://cdn.simpleicons.org/windows/0078D4" width="16"> Windows

| Platform | Architecture | Format |
|----------|-------------|--------|
| Windows | x64 | `_x64-setup.exe` |
| Windows | ARM64 | `_arm64-setup.exe` |

### <img src="https://cdn.simpleicons.org/linux/FCC624" width="16"> Linux

| Platform | Architecture | Format |
|----------|-------------|--------|
| Debian / Ubuntu | x64 | `_amd64.deb` |
| Debian / Ubuntu | ARM64 | `_arm64.deb` |
| Fedora / openSUSE | x64 | `_x86_64.rpm` |
| Fedora / openSUSE | ARM64 | `_aarch64.rpm` |
| AppImage (universal) | x64 | `_amd64.AppImage` |
| AppImage (universal) | ARM64 | `_arm64.AppImage` |
